ygData.subject: Re: Hey this sounded interesting..
ygData.msgSnippet: Bards do not need bind and are not going to get it.  Group bind?  Absolutely rediculous, although I sincerely salute the creativity of the orginal
ygData.messageBody:
Bards do not need bind and are not going to get it. Group bind? Absolutely
rediculous, although I sincerely salute the creativity of the orginal
alt.games.everquest poster's suggestion. Can you imagine the uproar from the
other classes (especially melee) if we got GROUP BIND?

The one hope that I would extend to my fellow bards that can't seem to come to
grips with the fact that they don't need bind is that the Expansion Pack will
probably have to have 25 new songs in it for levels 51-75. Maybe you guys
will get a bind affinity song in there somewhere, but I doubt it.

Crier Sharpsong - happlily Selo'ing her way across two or three zones to
retrive her corpse


Jason A. Farqu´┐¢
CDI at http://www.pigging.com/


> Bard's Bind would have a lengthy casting time instead of the usual "3.0".
> And it would use mana, and a component (a piece of ore, or maybe some other
> item which would fuel a bit of economy).
